entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023
